home__titel: Chasellas 62 - Relaxation amidst the Engadin mountain world
home__untertitel: Welcome to the Chasellas 62 holiday home in Sent. Thinking of a mountain vacation? Then you've come to the right place. We look forward to your visit.
home__standordbeschreibung: The Chasellas 62 holiday home stylishly combines the authentic atmosphere of a traditional Engadine house with modern living comfort. It is located in the heart of the charming village of Sent, a Rhaeto-Romanic gem in the Lower Engadine known for its sunny location and picturesque mountain backdrop. The house offers direct access to the historic village square, local restaurants and the bus stop, making it easy to explore the entire region. The building itself embodies typical Engadine architecture with thick stone walls, deep windows and decorative sgraffito that reflects the rich history of the region.
grundrissBeschreibungUnten: The apartment has a floor area of 217.00 m² and consists of 8 rooms. There is also access to the basement and a small garden terrace. The lower living room is open and has a dining table. The kitchen is separate. The lower bathroom is equipped with a shower and the upper one with a bathtub. Both bathrooms include toilets. Both balconies are located on the 2nd floor with views of the mountains and the church tower.
grundRissBeschreibungOben: The apartment has a floor area of 98.30 m² and consists of 4 rooms. The apartment also has a 61.20 m² roof terrace with views of the mountains and valleys. The bathroom is equipped with a shower. The kitchen is open and includes a large dining table, perfect for cozy lunches and dinners.
confirmation__paragraph: Thank you for your booking. We look forward to welcoming you soon.
name: Name
mottaNaluns__paragraph_long: The Motta Naluns ski area offers a variety of activities not only in winter, but also countless experiences in nature in summer. In winter, well-groomed slopes and trails attract both beginners and experienced skiers and snowboarders. Enjoy the breathtaking panoramic views as you glide over the gentle slopes or take a winter hike. In summer, Motta Naluns turns into a paradise for hikers, mountain bikers and nature lovers. Experience the pristine mountain landscape, interspersed with blooming alpine meadows and clear mountain streams. The extensive hiking trails lead you to magnificent viewpoints that offer a fantastic view of the surrounding peaks and valleys. For families, there are numerous child-friendly activities, including themed hiking trails and adventure playgrounds in the midst of nature.
mottaNaluns__paragraph_short: The Motta Naluns ski area offers ideal conditions for skiers and snowboarders in winter, as well as hiking trails and mountain bike routes in summer. Enjoy the magnificent views of the surrounding mountains and valleys and experience pure nature - no matter what time of year.
hatecke__paragraph_long: Hatecke Butcher's Shop is considered one of the best butcher's shops in Switzerland and stands for the highest quality and traditional craftsmanship. Here you can expect a select range of exclusive meat and sausage products from the Engadin region. Whether fine Engadine Salsiz, air-dried specialties or tender meat - the products of Hatecke Butcher's Shop convince with their authentic, natural taste and freshness. A must for gourmets and lovers of regional delicacies looking for the best the region has to offer.
hatecke__paragraph_short: Hatecke Butcher's Shop is one of the best butcher's shops in Switzerland and known for high-quality meat and sausage products from the region. It stands for excellent quality and offers regional specialties that delight gourmets.
eisweg__paragraph_long: Too tired for an early ski day? The ice path in Sur En offers the perfect alternative for a relaxed day in nature. Over a length of 3 kilometers, the well-groomed ice path winds through the idyllic forest landscape of the Engadin and invites you to a leisurely ice skating tour. Surrounded by snow-covered trees and the silence of the forest, you can enjoy the winter atmosphere to the fullest. The ice path is ideal for families, couples or even for a relaxed break alone. Along the route, there are always dreamlike views of the surrounding mountains. With a hot chocolate in the thermos, this excursion becomes an unforgettable winter experience - far away from the hustle and bustle of the ski slopes.
eisweg__paragraph_short: The ice path in Sur En offers a relaxed alternative to skiing. Over a length of 3 kilometers, it leads through the winter forest landscape of the Engadin and invites you to a cozy ice skating experience - perfect for a relaxing break in nature.
bognEngiadina__paragraph_long: Bogn Engiadina Scuol is a modern thermal bath in the heart of the Engadin and offers you a perfect oasis of relaxation after an active day in the mountains. The thermal bath is known for its unique architecture, which harmoniously blends into the alpine landscape, and for its variety of wellness and relaxation offerings. The various indoor and outdoor pools are filled with mineral-rich thermal water from the healing springs of the region, which has a beneficial effect on body and mind. Let the warmth of the water relax your muscles after a long day of skiing and enjoy the panoramic view of the surrounding mountains while breathing in the fresh mountain air in the outdoor pool. Bogn Engiadina Scuol is the ideal place to harmonize body and soul and recharge your batteries.
bognEngiadina__paragraph_short: Bogn Engiadina Scuol is a modern thermal bath in the heart of the Engadin and offers a perfect oasis of relaxation after an active day in the mountains. The thermal bath is known for its unique architecture, which harmoniously blends into the alpine landscape, and for its variety of wellness and relaxation offerings.
loginForReview: Please log in to write a review
formulaHeader: We want to make your stay as pleasant as possible
formulaText: To make your stay with us even more enjoyable, we invite you to fill out a short form. Alternatively, you can also send us a short video introducing yourself. This helps us better cater to your wishes and needs. We look forward to hearing from you!.
